definition[0]: if you are amused by something, you think it is funny and you smile or laugh
example[0]: I could see she was highly amused  (=very amused).
example[1]: The man looked a little amused.
example[2]: He won’t be very amused  (=he will be annoyed) when he finds out what’s happened to his garden.
example[3]: Ellen seemed amused by the whole situation.
